audioText: Demain j'apporterai ma tablette graphique au bureau car mon métier d'artiste numérique demande cet équipement spécialisé.
question: Why will the speaker bring their graphics tablet to the office tomorrow?
options: Because their digital artist job requires this specialized equipment
Because they want to show it to their colleagues
Because they need to repair it during lunch break
Because they forgot to bring it home yesterday
explanation: The text states 'Demain j'apporterai ma tablette graphique au bureau car mon métier d'artiste numérique demande cet équipement spécialisé' - Tomorrow I will bring my graphics tablet to the office because my digital artist job requires this specialized equipment. 'Apporterai' is the future tense first person singular of 'apporter'.
